title: Supporting the Child Care Workforce in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the primary challenge facing the child care workforce in Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of interest in the profession
Disparity between urban and rural areas
questions.answer: Disparity between urban and rural areas
